Job Posting: 177884 - Position: S26 Product Engineering Assistant (Co-op) 177884 Co-op Work Term Posted: 2026 - Summer App Deadline Application Method: Posting Goes Live: Job Posting Status: 02/13/2026 09:00 AM Through Employer Website 01/30/2026 11:46 AM Approved ORGANIZATION INFORMATION Organization Address Line 1 City Postal Code / Zip Code Province / State Country Siemens Canada Limited 1577 North Service Road East Oakville L6H 0H6 Ontario Canada JOB POSTING INFORMATION Placement Term <b> Job Title <b> Position Type Job Location Country Duration Salary Currency Salary Job Description 2026 - Summer S26 Product Engineering Assistant (Co-op) 177884 Co-op Position Ottawa, ON Canada 4 months CAD Salary Not Available, 0 Major List Job Title: Product Engineering Assistant (Co-op) Job ID: R-25864 Position Overview • Under the supervision of the Manager, Assay Performance Support, the Product Engineering Assistant will be responsible for supporting work related to the operations of the Research & Development team in ongoing product and process improvement initiatives • Includes supporting data acquisition, data analysis, and contribute to the metrics/visualizations required for ongoing monitoring of product (test card) performance • Opportunity to experience a demanding, fast paced medical device manufacturing environment, while interacting with highly multidisciplinary groups At Siemens Healthineers, we offer you a flexible and dynamic environment with opportunities to go beyond your comfort zone in order to grow personally and professionally. Sound interesting? Then come and join our global team as a Product Engineering Assistant (Co-op). Citizenship Requirement N/A APPLICATION INFORMATION Application Procedure Through Employer Website Cover Letter Required? Yes Address Cover Letter to Hiring Manager Special Application Instructions Application Link: https://careers.siemens-healthineers.com/global/en/job/R-25864/Product-Engineering-Assistant-Co-op Please click the "I intend to apply to this position" button on SCOPE and also submit your application via the employer's website. Applications are accepted on a rolling basis and the posting may be expired at any time by the employer as submissions are received. Students should submit their applications as soon as they are ready.
